item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 20th October
item.description:
Blocked or damaged drain The drain can no longer be seen as grass has grown over it. Every time it rains a huge area is covered with water making the drivers swerve and pedestrians are unable to pass safely on the pavement or get a tidal wave of water over them if cars don’t take care. It’s a reoccurring as design is poor. The drain is blocked
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate is damaged/missing/locked problem, 20th October
item.description:
Reporting:gate_is_damaged_missing_locked This heavy gate has to be lifted along the ground as I think the hinge post has rotted out, so you are lifting both gate and post. It is near impossible to open, and damaged my back in doing so.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 20th October
item.description:
Blocked or damaged drain Unknown. Rain stopped hours ago and road is dry. However, water is flowing up through the drain grid and along the road surface towards Nine Elms Road. It then flows into the next drain grid, which suggests that there is an underground blockage between the two drain grids. The drain is blocked
Report on FixMyStreet
